about_the_game:
A world shrouded in darkness due to environmental changes.

Six chosen girls play melodies to generate "Luminous," a source of light energy.

The Appeal of Luminous Project

  • With a wide range of difficulty levels and a player-friendly design, even rhythm game beginners can enjoy with confidence!

  • Note-tapping via key presses becomes intuitive over time, giving players a real sense of improvement!

  • Challenging simultaneous multi-key presses cleverly push players to test their skills!

  • Each character has their own signature music genre, allowing players to enjoy a diverse range of songs! That's a total of 120 songs!

[Game Overview]

Luminous Project is a casual rhythm game.
Overall, the game is designed to be relatively easy, so unlike typical rhythm games, it doesn't require exceptional reflexes to keep up with fast-moving notes.

The game features a total of 120 tracks, each with three difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, and Hard.

  • Easy and Normal are perfect for beginners or those who find rhythm games challenging.

  • Hard is for more experienced players and includes some highly demanding note patterns.

Additionally, each character comes with a unique set of tracks that reflect their distinct atmosphere.

The gameplay is simple: press the corresponding keys in time with the falling notes.
There are two types of notes: Tap Notes and Hold Notes.

Avoid making mistakes and aim to maintain a long combo streak.
You clear a song by achieving an accuracy of 80% or higher. Keep challenging yourself to aim for a Full Combo (100%)!

*This product supports English; however, some of the music titles and composer names displayed in the game include Japanese text.

[Features]

  • Timing Adjustment:
    You can fine-tune the synchronization between the notes and the music.

  • Customizable Key Settings:
    The default key layout uses six keys: S, D, F, J, K, and L. You can reassign these keys to suit your preferences.

  • Skip Mode:
    Practice specific sections of a song by skipping directly to the parts you find difficult.

[Streaming Guidelines]

You are free to record and live-stream gameplay of Luminous Project for both commercial and non-commercial purposes.
Please include the URL of the Luminous Project Steam store page in your video description or streaming details.

name: Luminous Project
short_description: A national project where six girls play melodies to save the Earth. This is a simple rhythm game where you press keys in time with falling notes. Play through a variety of songs and gather the light of hope, Luminous!
